theme.title: Two 16th notes and one 8th
theme.para: In this lesson two new rhythmic patterns are introduced:

score.music: (Metrica 2 4 NoVisible)(n a4 s g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 c g-)) (c (n a4 s g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 c l g-)(n a4 n)(Barra Final))

part.title: Lesson and note the differences
part.para: Note the differences between the following rhythmic patterns and how they are formed when we tie notes in the basic four 8th notes pattern. Compare this pattern with the one in the last measure. Note the different rhythmic accent between measures 3 and 4.

score.music: (Metrica 2 8)(n a4 s g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 s)(n a4 s g-)) (c (n a4 s g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 s l)(n a4 s g-)) (c (n a4 s g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 c g-)) (c (n a4 c g+)(n a4 s)(n a4 s g-)(Barra Final))

part.title: Exercises
part.para: Exercise 1 - Train your ear and practise the introduced rhythmic patterns.
